introduction.achievements4: medal of excellence in worldskils special edition

about_me.title: Sobre mi
about_me.info:
I'm Juan Diego, a passionate software developer specializing in web and mobile development.

I represented Colombia in the WorldSkills 2022 competition and won a medal of excellence thanks to my skills and knowledge in different programming languages, API design, SQL and design patterns.

I love learning new tools and updating myself day by day with the latest technology. If you want to know more about my work experience, take a look at my LinkedIn profile or scroll down and see some of my work.

services.title: Web Design and Development
services.description: Customized Web Design and Development, creating modern, intuitive, and search engine optimized (SEO) websites, tailored to each client's needs.

services.title: Mobile Apps
services.description: Personalized mobile app development for Android, tailored to the client's needs.

services.title: Desktop Development
services.description: Customized desktop program development, tailored to each client's needs. I create high-quality, user-friendly desktop programs.

services.title: Custom Software
services.description: I create the solution your business needs, including the entire development cycle from requirements analysis to maintenance.

services.title: Classes
services.description: I provide personal classes for those who need to reinforce knowledge or learn new technologies.

skills.name: C#
skills.description: It is an object-oriented, general-purpose programming language developed by Microsoft. It is primarily used to develop desktop, mobile, web, and game applications. C# is based on the .NET framework and offers advanced features such as automatic garbage collection and memory management.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: It is an object-oriented programming language used to develop enterprise, mobile, and game applications. It is based on the Java Virtual Machine (JVM) for portability and offers high-level features such as automatic garbage collection and exception handling.

skills.name: Php
skills.description: It is a widely used web programming language. It allows for creating dynamic and customized web applications. It is easy to use and has a large community of developers.

skills.name: Javascript
skills.description: It is a programming language used to develop interactive web applications. It runs on the user's browser and adds interactivity to web pages. It is essential for any modern web developer.

skills.name: Vue.js
skills.description: It's a JavaScript framework for building interactive user interfaces and single-page applications. It provides a component-based approach to web application development, allowing for greater modularity and code reuse. It's highly adaptable and easy to integrate with other JavaScript libraries.

skills.name: Angular
skills.description: It's a JavaScript framework for building web and hybrid mobile applications. It uses TypeScript for greater efficiency and is highly scalable. It has a large community of developers and modern development tools.

skills.name: Kotlin
skills.description: It's a programming language used for developing Android, server, and web applications. It's safe, interoperable, and concise. It's compatible with popular development tools and has a growing community.

skills.name: CSS
skills.description: It's a cascading style sheet language used in web development to describe the visual presentation of HTML and XML documents. While not considered a full programming language, it's essential for creating modern and attractive websites. It's supported by all modern web browsers.

skills.name: HTML
skills.description: Es un lenguaje de marcado utilizado para crear páginas web y otros documentos. Proporciona una estructura para el contenido y utiliza etiquetas para definir el significado de cada elemento. Es esencial para el desarrollo web y compatible con todos los navegadores modernos.

skills.name: Android Studio
skills.description: Es el IDE oficial para el desarrollo de aplicaciones Android, creado por Google. Proporciona un editor de código, un depurador y emuladores de dispositivos, entre otras herramientas. Es compatible con Java, Kotlin y otros lenguajes de programación.

skills.name: SQL Server
skills.description: Es un RDBMS creado por Microsoft para la gestión y análisis de datos. Proporciona características como soporte para transacciones, consultas complejas y seguridad de datos. Ampliamente utilizado en empresas para almacenar y analizar grandes cantidades de datos.

skills.name: MySQL
skills.description: Es un sistema de gestión de bases de datos relacionales de código abierto, utilizado para almacenar y administrar datos en aplicaciones web. Proporciona características como soporte para transacciones, consultas complejas, escalabilidad, seguridad de datos y alta disponibilidad. Es ampliamente utilizado en aplicaciones web de todo el mundo.

skills.name: SQLite
skills.description: Es un motor de base de datos relacional ligero y sin servidor, utilizado para almacenar y administrar datos localmente. Fácil de integrar en aplicaciones, proporciona soporte para transacciones, consultas complejas y seguridad de datos. Compatible con la mayoría de los sistemas operativos.

skills.name: Figma
skills.description: It's a cloud-based tool for UI/UX design. It allows real-time collaboration and the creation of interactive designs and prototypes. It provides vector design tools, reusable component libraries, and a team collaboration platform.

skills.name: Ubuntu
skills.description: It's a free and open-source operating system based on Linux. Easy to install and use, it comes with a wide range of pre-installed applications and tools. Popular among Linux users for its ease of use and active community support.

skills.name: Visual Studio
skills.description: It's a Microsoft IDE. It offers tools for developing applications on multiple platforms and languages. It's used by developers to create desktop, web, and mobile applications.

skills.name: Visual Studio Code
skills.description: It's a free, multi-platform code editor from Microsoft. It has advanced tools like Git and code autocompletion. It's popular among developers for its ease of use and available extensions.

skills.name: React
skills.description: It is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It uses a component-based approach to create scalable and reusable web applications. React is highly popular and has a large community of developers and open-source code libraries.

skills.name: Node.js
skills.description: It is a JavaScript runtime environment built on the Google Chrome V8 engine. It allows developers to run JavaScript on the server-side to create scalable and high-performance web applications. Node.js has a large community and a rich ecosystem of libraries and tools.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: It is a software version control system used to track changes in source code during software development. Git is highly efficient and provides greater team collaboration and tracking of changes in source code. It is widely used in the software development industry.

items.Description: A web page was created in PHP without using a Framework, with object oriented programming and connected to a MySQL database. A section for clients and an administration panel to manage the site were also included.

I developed an access control system for a center using C# in Windows Form, an API with ASP.NET and a SQL Server database. In addition, I prepared for a competition using C# for desktop development and Java for mobile application development.

I prepared for the WorldSkills competition using the following programming languages: C# for the development of web pages, desktop applications and APIs, with the use of the Entities Framework. Perform automated testing with UNIT in C#, use Kotlin to create mobile applications, and JavaScript with the Vue.js Framework for web page development.

An interactive web page was created using the Vue.js Framework and JavaScript. The page features smooth animations and dynamic styling similar to a PowerPoint presentation, without requiring vertical scrolling to navigate through the content.

I developed an application for a fast food restaurant, specialized in pizza, using Angular, TypeScript and SCSS. The application allows customers to order online and customize their pizzas according to their tastes and preferences
I developed a portfolio to showcase my skills and more information about me, using Angular, TypeScript and SCSS.

I study in an elementary school in Carrizal, where there is still no electricity, internet, nothing technological, the town where Diomedez was born, and despite the lack of technology, I managed to become the champion of IT business software solutions and win a medal of excellence in South Korea...
I studied in high school at Junta until tenth grade, I always ranked first among my classmates and excelled with high honors in school, I wanted to finish but we had to leave my beloved town.
I graduated from Colegio Pablo VI, in Colombia, La Guajira, Barrancas, I ranked 3rd in the school in the ICFES tests

I performed a technologist in the Analysis and Development of information system, I earned the place to compete in worldskills where he was champion 2 times, worldskills colombia and chile in the skill IT Software solutions for business, and runner-up in worldskills america, and medal of excellence in Worldskills Special Edition in south korea.
